posts.post_title: WTB: Burch (Batting and Fielding) and Overall (Hands at Face)
posts.post_content:
Looking for VG to VG/EX.  No major creases, but a light surface wrinkle is okay.  PM me with scans and prices.  

Thanks for looking.
Picked up Overall tonight on eBay.  Still looking for Burch batting and fielding.
I have this great looking PSA 4 Burch batting. Looking for $100.00 shipped paypal gift. Sorry about the photo's no scanner. Thanks Daryl
